name: Parking Paradise
description:
Background

Made for a university portfolio project. The concept for this project is to take the flash game parking genre and convert the 2D web browser style to a polished 3D game.

Features
  • Five levels
  • Plus bonus levels!
  • Full native controller support for Xbox, PS4 and Switch Pro controllers.
  • Save system
  • Complete Discord integration.
  • Michael Reilly's Putting Challenge cameo!
Future Plans

If this project decides to continue development then expect to see in future updates: achievements, more levels, greater polish.

Final words

If you decide to play this game it would be very appreciated if you were to give constructive criticism in the comments, this is dire as it will make me a better developer in the future.

If you come across any bugs please tell me so I know what needs to be fixed.

Thank you for looking at my page, and I hope you enjoy the game.

*A controller is recommended for the best gameplay experience**PS4 and Switch Pro controllers require configuration via Steam or an external program for Windows to recognise them.
